TopicTitle: Complete Control of the Contract System

Articles.Content: I am trying to start work on a mod (plugin) that will change how / when contracts are offered. So far I have figured out how to react to the onOffered event of a contract, but I actually want to control the piece that is doing the offering. Where should I look to start making changes to that? In my search of the forums here, I have not found any hint of where to look. This is my first time developing any sort of mod for KSP, so please be nice. Cheers!
